booking.error:
Unfortunately an error occurred during the booking.
Please try again later.

confirmation.error: There was an error confirming the appointment.
confirmation.message:
We have sent you an e-mail with your appointment data!
Please confirm your appointment by clicking on the link in the e-mail!
Unconfirmed appointments are automatically cancelled after 24 hours.

gdpr.health: I acknowledge and consent that {dz} collects and stores information about my state of health in the context of a declaration or by presenting a certificate of fitness. Active participation in the tandem jump operations of the club is not possible without this consent.
gdpr.social: I agree that {dz} may publish videos and pictures of my person on its website or social networks for promotional or educational purposes.

handcam.info:
For how many of your booked tandem jumps would you like to have a handcam video (inside video)?
In this case, the images are taken by the tandemmaster himself via a camera attached to his hand.

jumpregulations.accept: I have read and accepted the skydive regulations above.
jumpregulations.heading: Skydive regulations
jumpregulations.text:
• skydiving is highly dependent on the weather. Therefore, for safety reasons, the final decision whether to jump or not lies with the tandem pilot.
  • Take at least 2 - 3 hours for your skydive, because the sequence and operation depend on many factors (weather, ...). In exceptional cases it may take longer.
    The agreed appointment is only to be understood as a guideline. It is also worthwhile to stay the whole day.
  • It is essential to note minimum and maximum dimensions for passengers. In case of non-compliance there is no claim to the skydive.
    • Minimum height: 140 cm
    • Maximum height: 190 cm
    • Maximum weight (with clothes!): 90 kg
    • Minimum age: 14 years (for minors the signature of both parents or guardians is required. The transport contract can also be filled out in advance).
  • You should not show any serious bone injuries within the last 12 months.
  • On the day of the jump any influence of drugs or alcohol is forbidden.
  • No pregnancy is allowed.
  • Please bring comfortable clothes and sneakers (without hooks and eyes) with you.
  • For safety reasons, it is not possible to jump with your own equipment (GoPro, Smartphone, etc.). If you want video/photos, please book this option.

name: Name

picAndVid.info:
For how many of your booked tandem jumps would you like to have photos AND video?
Here a second skydiver jumps out of the airplane together with the tandem and takes the shots.

picOrVid.info:
For how many of your booked tandem jumps would you like to have photos OR video?
Here a second skydiver jumps out of the airplane together with the tandem and takes the shots.

transportationHint: On the transportation agreement, which must be filled out on site, the signature of BOTH parents or guardians is required! If not both will be on site, the form can be filled out in advance ({url}). In this case we need a copy of the ID on site.

welcome.message: Please enter in the search mask how many tandem jumps and (if desired) additional videos you want to book. {br}The different options for available videos and photos are explained in the info box that opens when you click on the "i" next to each option. {br}For group bookings of 5 or more people please contact us by mail ({mail}). {br}If you have any further questions, please check our {faq} or contact us by mail or mobile on {tel}.
welcome.title: Welcome to {name}
